text: Rino Lupo (1888–1934) was an Italian-Portuguese film director.Vieira, p. 143. He made films in several countries during the silent era. He was forced to flee from Russia following the Russian Revolution in 1917. ==Selected filmography== * José do Telhado (1929) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Vieira, Patricia. Portuguese Film, 1930-1960,: The Staging of the New State Regime. A&C; Black, 2013. ==External links== * Category:1888 births Category:1934 deaths Category:Italian film directors Category:People from Rome Category:People who emigrated to escape Bolshevism
title: Rino Lupo
